在 /Users/a111111/code/ai-video-collection/web/src 目录下，我需要了解：

1. `Header` 组件被哪些 Layout 引用（搜索 import Header 或 from './Header'）
2. 这些 Layout 被哪些页面配置使用（搜索 withLayouts、DefaultLayout、getLayout 等模式，找到使用这些 layout 的页面文件）
3. 具体看 `/Users/a111111/code/ai-video-collection/web/src/pages/pollo.ai/_layout/index.tsx` 中 DefaultLayout 的完整实现（什么条件下显示 Header）
4. 搜索 `showHeaderMenu` 或 `showHeader` 相关 prop，找到哪些页面会隐藏 Header
5. 找到 `withLayouts` 或类似 HOC 的定义文件，看它如何决定用哪个 layout

目标：确认 Home 和 Effects 导航菜单项会出现在哪些 URL/页面范围上。只做搜索和读取，不修改代码。返回：
- Layout 引用链路
- 哪些页面会隐藏/不显示导航栏
- 哪些页面类型会显示完整导航栏

    19→import { api } from '@/utils/api'
    20→import { parse as parseCookie } from 'cookie'
    21→
    22→import type { TNextPagePro } from '@/types/global'
    23→import type { AppContext, AppType } from 'next/app'
    24→
    25→import '@/styles/global.scss'
    26→
    27→const App: AppType<
    28→  Awaited<ReturnType<typeof _getInitialProps>>['pageProps']
    29→> = (props) => {
    30→  const { router, Component, pageProps: _pageProps } = props
    31→  const { _extraProps, initialProps, ...pageProps } = _pageProps
    32→  const {
    33→    hostname,
    34→    resolvedHostname = window?._resolvedHostname,
    35→    locale,
    36→    translation,
    37→    localeVideos,
    38→    localeImages,
    39→    enabledPageWaitingScript,
    40→  } = _extraProps || {}
    41→  const errorBoundaryRef = useRef<ErrorBoundary>(null)
    42→  const [hasError, setHasError] = useState(false)
    43→  const pageRenderedQueueRef = useRef<
    44→    { rendered: JSX.Element; asPath: string }[]
    45→  >([])
    46→
    47→  const trpcUtils = api.useUtils()
    48→
    49→  if (typeof window !== 'undefined') {
    50→    window.trpcUtils = trpcUtils
    51→  }
    52→
    53→  const pushPageRenderedQueue = (page: JSX.Element) => {
    54→    if (
    55→      pageRenderedQueueRef.current[pageRenderedQueueRef.current.length - 1]
    56→        ?.asPath === router.asPath
    57→    ) {
    58→      return
    59→    }
    60→    pageRenderedQueueRef.current.push({
    61→      rendered: page,
    62→      asPath: router.asPath,
    63→    })
    64→    if (pageRenderedQueueRef.current.length > 2) {
    65→      pageRenderedQueueRef.current.shift()
    66→    }
    67→  }
    68→
    69→  useEffect(() => {
    70→    window.getPreviousRenderedPage = () => {
    71→      return pageRenderedQueueRef.current[1]?.rendered
    72→    }
    73→  }, [])
    74→
    75→  useEffect(() => {
    76→    if (process.env.NEXT_PUBLIC_PREVIEW === 'true') {
    77→      // eslint-disable-next-line no-console
    78→      console.log('--->[mode: PREVIEW]<---')
    79→    }
    80→  }, [])
    81→
    82→  // support mobile debug tool
    83→  useEffect(() => {
    84→    if (
    85→      process.env.NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_ENV !== 'production' &&
    86→      window.location.search.includes('debug=true')
    87→    ) {
    88→      const script = document.createElement('script')
    89→      script.src = 'https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/eruda'
    90→      script.onload = () => {
    91→        ;(window as any).eruda.init()
    92→      }
    93→      document.body.appendChild(script)
    94→    }
    95→  }, [])
    96→
    97→  // 当渲染 ErrorBoundary 错误页面时，如果点击返回时默认仍然会显示错误页面，
    98→  // 需要在页面改变前重置 ErrorBoundary 状态
    99→  useEffect(() => {
   100→    if (!hasError) {
   101→      return
   102→    }
   103→
   104→    const handleRouteStart = () => {
   105→      errorBoundaryRef.current?.reset()
   106→    }
   107→    router.events.on('routeChangeStart', handleRouteStart)
   108→
   109→    return () => {
   110→      router.events.off('routeChangeStart', handleRouteStart)
   111→    }
   112→  }, [router.events, hasError])
   113→
   114→  let result: JSX.Element
   115→
   116→  if (!resolvedHostname) {
   117→    // 如果没有通过 router.route 匹配到应用配置
   118→    // 则说明访问的地址非法，此时对应的 Component 为 Next.js 默认的 404/500 页面
   119→    // 或者开发环境通过 localhost 可访问的页面，比如 /_images
   120→    // 且 404/500 页面通常不会出现客户端异常
   121→    result = (
   122→      <>
   123→        <CoreDataScript />
   124→        <ABTestScript />
   125→        <AppSessionProvider>
   126→          <ErrorBoundary
   127→            ref={errorBoundaryRef}
   128→            onError={() => {
   129→              setHasError(true)
   130→            }}
   131→          >
   132→            <I18N locale={locale} translation={translation}>
   133→              <Component {...initialProps} {...pageProps} />
   134→            </I18N>
   135→          </ErrorBoundary>
   136→        </AppSessionProvider>
   137→      </>
   138→    )
   139→    pushPageRenderedQueue(result)
   140→    return result
   141→  }
   142→
   143→  result = (
   144→    <>
   145→      <CoreDataScript />
   146→      <ABTestScript />
   147→      {enabledPageWaitingScript && <PageWaitingScript />}
   148→      <UserPreferenceScript />
   149→      <SiteContextProvider
   150→        hostname={hostname}
   151→        resolvedHostname={resolvedHostname}
   152→        localeVideos={localeVideos}
   153→        localeImages={localeImages}
   154→      >
   155→        <AppSessionProvider>
   156→          <ErrorBoundary
   157→            ref={errorBoundaryRef}
   158→            onError={() => {
   159→              setHasError(true)
   160→            }}
   161→          >
   162→            <AppUIModalProvider>
   163→              {/* 避免页面切换时部分组件不支持状态更新导致异常，统一添加 key 解决 */}
   164→              <I18N locale={locale} translation={translation}>
   165→                <Component {...initialProps} {...pageProps} />
   166→              </I18N>
   167→              <GlobalErrorHandler />
   168→            </AppUIModalProvider>
   169→          </ErrorBoundary>
   170→        </AppSessionProvider>
   171→      </SiteContextProvider>
   172→    </>
   173→  )
   174→  pushPageRenderedQueue(result)
   175→
   176→  return (
   177→    <>
   178→      <DynamicGlobalComponent />
   179→      <DynamicGlobalComponentForDev />
   180→      <FaroObservability />
   181→      {result}
   182→    </>
   183→  )
   184→}
   185→
   186→/**
   187→ * 测试发现客户端服务端总是会调用，仅在页面在浏览器中返回时不会触发服务端逻辑
   188→ */
   189→async function _getInitialProps(appCtx: AppContext) {
   190→  const url = isBrowser() ? window.location.href : appCtx.ctx.req?.url || ''
   191→  // Headers 中的 host 等价于客户端中的 window.location.hostname
   192→  // ref: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/3364144/is-port-number-required-in-http-host-header-parameter
   193→  const hostname = appCtx.ctx.req?.headers.host || window.location.hostname
   194→  const resolvedHostname = await cacheResolveHostname(hostname)
   195→  const locale = appCtx.ctx.locale
   196→  const pagePathName = appCtx.router.pathname
   197→  const pagePath = appCtx.ctx.pathname
   198→  const coreAppPage = (appCtx.Component as TNextPagePro)?.coreAppPage
   199→  const pureAppPage = (appCtx.Component as TNextPagePro)?.pureAppPage || false
   200→
   201→  // 读取 cookie
   202→  const cookies = parseCookie(appCtx.ctx.req?.headers.cookie || '')
   203→
   204→  const _enabledPageWaitingScript = (appCtx.Component as TNextPagePro)
   205→    ?.enabledPageWaitingScript
   206→  const enabledPageWaitingScript =
   207→    typeof _enabledPageWaitingScript === 'function'
   208→      ? _enabledPageWaitingScript({
   209→          pathname: appCtx.router.asPath.split('?')[0],
   210→          query: appCtx.router.query,
   211→          cookies,
   212→        })
   213→      : _enabledPageWaitingScript || false
   214→
   215→  const localeVideos =
   216→    videos[(locale || 'en') as keyof typeof videos] || videos.en
   217→
   218→  const localeImages =
   219→    images[(locale || 'en') as keyof typeof images] || images.en
   220→
   221→  const translation =
   222→    (typeof coreAppPage !== 'boolean' && coreAppPage?.noI18n) ||
   223→    pureAppPage ||
   224→    (IS_DEV && hostname.includes('localhost') && pagePathName === '/_error') ||
   225→    (process.env.NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_ENV === 'test' &&
   226→      url.includes('_i18n_inspect'))
   227→      ? {}
   228→      : await loadTranslation(locale, resolvedHostname.deepHostKey, pagePath)
   229→
   230→  const getInitialProps = async () => {
   231→    if (appCtx.Component.getInitialProps) {
   232→      const result = await appCtx.Component.getInitialProps(appCtx.ctx)
   233→      return result
   234→    }
   235→    return {}
   236→  }
   237→  const [initialProps] = await Promise.all([getInitialProps()])
   238→
   239→  const _extraProps = {
   240→    hostname,
   241→    resolvedHostname,
   242→    locale,
   243→    translation,
   244→    coreAppPage,
   245→    pureAppPage,
   246→    enabledPageWaitingScript,
   247→    localeVideos,
   248→    localeImages,
   249→  }
   250→
   251→  return {
   252→    // 方便类型推导
   253→    _extraProps,
   254→    initialProps,
   255→    pageProps: {
   256→      // 实际上 trpc 目前只能通过 pageProps 内部传值的方式传入数据
   257→      // ref: https://github.dev/trpc/trpc/blob/04a9dc64097a4a9594ba5b09b68f7a3ae6404fde/packages/next/src/withTRPC.tsx#L162-L163
   258→      _extraProps,
   259→      initialProps,
   260→    },
   261→  }
   262→}
   263→
   264→App.getInitialProps = _getInitialProps
   265→
   266→export default api.withTRPC(App)
   267→

    67→  items.forEach((item) => {

    69→      item.sortIndex = currentIndex++

    71→    if (item.videoAiList?.length || item.imageAiList?.length) {

    77→        }

    79→    } else if (item.groupTab?.length) {

    85→          }
    86→        })
    87→      })
    88→    }
    89→  })

content.text: Let me check the RootLayout and AntdLayout to understand how layouts are applied:

content.content:
1→import SensorsSetup from '@/_blocks/Analytics/blocks/SensorsSetup'
     2→import DynamicAccountDevTool from '@/_blocks/Managements/_components/DynamicAccountDevTool'
     3→import { useAbTestFromUrl } from '@/hooks/userGroup/abTest/dev-tools-ab-test'
     4→import BaseLayout from '@/layouts/base'
     5→import DynamicTipsModal from '@/pages/pollo.ai/_blocks/Modals/dynamic'
     6→import useCheckInNotification from '@/pages/pollo.ai/_blocks/Modals/Tips/DailyCheckInModal/_block/DailyCheckIn/_hooks/useCheckInNotification'
     7→import { FloatingAppDownload } from '@/pages/pollo.ai/_components/FloatingAppDownload'
     8→import { PolloGlobalEvent } from '@/pages/pollo.ai/_components/PolloGlobalEvent'
     9→import { InflowRouteQueryProvider } from '@/pages/pollo.ai/_context/InflowQuery/InflowRouteQueryProvider'
    10→import { MediaToolsProvider } from '@/pages/pollo.ai/_hooks/useMediaTools/provider'
    11→import figmaStyles from '@/pages/pollo.ai/_styles/figma-theme.module.scss'
    12→import themeStyles from '@/pages/pollo.ai/_styles/theme.module.scss'
    13→// import { StoreDebugger } from '@/pages/pollo.ai/app/_home/components/StoreDebugger'
    14→import { inter } from '@/styles/next-font'
    15→import { NuqsAdapter } from 'nuqs/adapters/next/pages'
    16→import React from 'react'
    17→
    18→import type { IBaseLayoutProps } from '@/layouts/base'
    19→
    20→import layoutStyles from './index.module.scss'
    21→
    22→/**
    23→ * 站点根布局组件，无 UI 实现
    24→ *
    25→ * 包括：
    26→ * - 样式主题加载
    27→ * - seo 等 BaseLayout 支持的相关属性配置
    28→ */
    29→const RootLayout: React.FC<
    30→  Pick<IBaseLayoutProps, 'seo' | 'className' | 'children' | 'locales' | 'style'>
    31→> = (props) => {
    32→  const { seo, className, children, locales, style } = props || {}
    33→
    34→  const themeClassNames = useMemo(() => {
    35→    return [
    36→      inter.className,
    37→      inter.variable,
    38→      themeStyles.theme,
    39→      figmaStyles.theme,
    40→      layoutStyles.layout,
    41→    ].filter(Boolean)
    42→  }, [])
    43→
    44→  useEffect(() => {
    45→    // 异步添加到全局样式中，使得挂载到 body 中的元素也能使用应用主题相关变量
    46→    document.documentElement.classList.add(...themeClassNames)
    47→  }, [themeClassNames])
    48→
    49→  useCheckInNotification()
    50→
    51→  // ab 测试结果切换
    52→  useAbTestFromUrl()
    53→
    54→  return (
    55→    <InflowRouteQueryProvider>
    56→      {/* FIXME: 不要删掉，调试用 */}
    57→      {/* <StoreDebugger /> */}
    58→
    59→      <SensorsSetup />
    60→
    61→      <BaseLayout
    62→        seo={seo}
    63→        imgAlt={'Unbounded AI Video Generator.'}
    64→        progressColor='#a2c0fa'
    65→        className={cls`
    66→          ${themeClassNames}

## Navigation Menu Visibility Analysis Report

Based on my thorough exploration of the codebase, here's the complete breakdown of where the "Home" and "Effects" navigation menu items appear:

### 1. HEADER NAVIGATION MENU STRUCTURE

**Location:** `/Users/a111111/code/ai-video-collection/web/src/pages/pollo.ai/_layout/Header/`

The navigation menu is defined in:
- **Menu Definition:** `/Users/a111111/code/ai-video-collection/web/src/pages/pollo.ai/_layout/Header/HeaderMenu/menu.tsx` (useHeaderMenu hook)
- **Menu Rendering (Desktop):** `/Users/a111111/code/ai-video-collection/web/src/pages/pollo.ai/_layout/Header/HeaderMenu/_block/PCMenu/index.tsx`
- **Menu Rendering (Mobile):** `/Users/a111111/code/ai-video-collection/web/src/pages/pollo.ai/_layout/Header/HeaderMenu/_block/MobileMenu/index.tsx`

**Key Menu Items (from menu.tsx, lines 96-976):**
- **Home** (line 98): `link: '/'`, always visible
- **Effects** (line 325): `link: undefined` with `groupTab` containing:
  - Video Effects submenu (video-effects, ai-kissing, ai-hug, ai-twerk, etc.)
  - Image Effects submenu (photo-effects with various effects)

### 2. HEADER VISIBILITY RULES

**Default Layout File:** `/Users/a111111/code/ai-video-collection/web/src/pages/pollo.ai/_layout/index.tsx` (lines 122-149)

The Header displays based on:
```typescript
{headerProps !== false && !mainOnly ? (
  <Header {...headerProps} />
) : null}
```

**Header Menu Visibility Control:**
- **Prop:** `showHeaderMenu` (in `headerProps`)
- **Default:** `true` (line 45 in Header/index.tsx)
- **CSS Control:** Line 40 in HeaderMenu/index.tsx:
  ```typescript
  className={cls`${showHeaderMenu ? '' : 'xl:hidden'}`}
  ```
  Menu is hidden on desktop (xl breakpoint) when `showHeaderMenu: false`, but mobile menu still shows with hamburger icon

### 3. PAGES THAT SHOW FULL HEADER MENU (Home & Effects visible)

These pages have **no `showHeaderMenu: false`** in their headerProps or don't override it:

**Pages with Default Header Menu:**
- `/` (Home) - line 97 in explore/[...slug].page.tsx shows it gets `showHeaderMenu: false`, but index.page.tsx shows nav mode
- `/about-us` - Uses DefaultLayout without showHeaderMenu override
- `/pricing` - Uses DefaultLayout without showHeaderMenu override  
- `/whats-new` - Uses DefaultLayout without showHeaderMenu override
- `Free-trial-policy` - line 96: `headerProps={{ transparentOnScrollTop0: true }}`

### 4. PAGES THAT HIDE HEADER MENU (No Home/Effects in header menu)

Pages with `showHeaderMenu: false` in headerProps:

**Video/Image Creation Tools (hide menu):**
- `/text-to-video` (line 96-99)
- `/video-to-video` (Layout/index.tsx)
- `/mimic-motion` (Layout/index.tsx)
- `/ai-image-generator` (Layout/index.tsx, [...params]/index.page.tsx)
- `/image-to-image-ai` (Layout/index.tsx)
- `/ai-effects` (index.page.tsx line 96, [...params]/index.page.tsx)
- `/ai-animation-generator` (index.page.tsx)
- `/ai-avatar` (index.page.tsx, [...params]/index.page.tsx)
- `/ai-product-avatar` (index.page.tsx)
- `/ai-singing-avatar` (index.page.tsx)
- `/ai-video-editor` (index.page.tsx)
- `/ai-video-agent` (index.page.tsx)

**Gallery/Exploration Pages:**
- `/explore` (line 96-100): `showHeaderMenu: false` BUT `nav: true` - shows menu in footer instead
- `/use-cases` (line 45): `showHeaderMenu: false` BUT `nav: !isCompactMenu` - conditional based on menu type

**Other Pages (no menu header):**
- `/app/*` (app pages)
- `/assets` (asset gallery)
- `/image-tools`, `/image-inspiration`
- `/template/*`
- `/photo-effects/*`
- `profile/*`, `ad/*` pages

**Completely Hidden Header:**
- `/app-install` - `headerProps={false}` (completely hides header)
- `/avatar-studio`, `/image-studio`, `/video-studio` - `headerProps={false}`
- `/paid-successfully` - `headerProps={false}`

### 5. FOOTER NAVIGATION (Fallback for Hidden Headers)

**Location:** `/Users/a111111/code/ai-video-collection/web/src/pages/pollo.ai/_layout/Footer/`

**Footer Navigation Link:** Home and Effects also appear in footer via:
- File: `/Users/a111111/code/ai-video-collection/web/src/pages/pollo.ai/_layout/Footer/data.tsx`
- These are not "Home" and "Effects" menu items but individual tool links under:
  - Creative Tools section
  - Video Models section
  - etc.

**Footer Tab (Mobile Navigation):**
- **Location:** `/Users/a111111/code/ai-video-collection/web/src/pages/pollo.ai/_layout/FooterTab/index.tsx` (lines 15-35)
- **Shown on:** Home (/), profiles, /app/*, /assets, /explore, /ai-effects, /video/*, /image/*, /loras, /tag-detail
- **Hidden on:** Tool pages, content creation pages

### 6. SUMMARY TABLE

| Page Type | URL Pattern | Header Visible | Menu (Home/Effects) Visible | Footer Nav Visible |
|-----------|------------|---|---|---|
| Home Page | `/` | Yes | Yes ✓ | Yes |
| Explore | `/explore` | Yes | No (footer nav instead) | Yes |
| Use Cases (Apps) | `/use-cases` | Yes | Conditional (compact mode) | No |
| About/Pricing | `/about-us`, `/pricing` | Yes | Yes ✓ | No |
| Video Generators | `/text-to-video`, `/image-to-video`, etc. | Yes | No | No |
| Effects Pages | `/ai-effects`, `/ai-avatar`, etc. | Yes | No | No |
| App Dashboard | `/app/*` | Yes | No | Yes |
| Asset Gallery | `/assets` | Yes | No | Yes |
| Studio Pages | `/avatar-studio`, `/video-studio` | No | No | No |

### 7. REFERENCED FILES CHAIN

```
_app.page.tsx (App wrapper)
  ↓
pages/pollo.ai/*.page.tsx (Individual pages)
  ↓
withLayouts HOC (react-dx library)
  ↓
DefaultLayout (/pages/pollo.ai/_layout/index.tsx)
  ├─ Header (/pages/pollo.ai/_layout/Header/index.tsx)
  │  ├─ HeaderMenu (/pages/pollo.ai/_layout/Header/HeaderMenu/index.tsx)
  │  │  ├─ PCMenu (desktop, line 29-98)
  │  │  │  └─ useHeaderMenu() → menu.tsx (lines 96-976)
  │  │  └─ MobileMenu (mobile)
  ├─ Main Content (children)
  ├─ Footer (/pages/pollo.ai/_layout/Footer/index.tsx)
  │  └─ FooterData (/pages/pollo.ai/_layout/Footer/data.tsx)
  └─ FooterTab (mobile navigation, /pages/pollo.ai/_layout/FooterTab/index.tsx)
```

### KEY INSIGHTS FOR MENU VISIBILITY:

- **Home** menu item appears in header on all pages where header menu is enabled
- **Effects** menu item (with Video/Image Effects submenus) appears in header on all pages where header menu is enabled  
- **Pages that SHOW the menu:** Home (/), About, Pricing, static content pages, dashboard pages (/app/*)
- **Pages that HIDE the menu:** Content creation/tool pages (text-to-video, ai-effects, ai-avatar, etc.) and some gallery pages (Explore, Assets)
- **Fallback navigation:** Footer shows tool links when header menu is hidden; FooterTab (mobile) shows navigation on home, explore, profiles, and app pages
